name: n8n-skills
description: Agent skills for building custom n8n community nodes and creating n8n workflows programmatically

plugins.name: n8n-node-builder
plugins.description: Scaffolds, implements, tests, and publishes custom n8n community nodes using official best practices. Covers declarative and programmatic styles, all credential/auth patterns, trigger nodes, and verification requirements.

plugins.name: n8n-workflow-sdk
plugins.description: Builds, tests, validates, and manages n8n workflows programmatically using the @n8n/workflow-sdk. Covers workflow creation, JSON import/export, validation, code generation, AI agent workflows, and the full SDK API.
